publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4226 George Foulkes: Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success—That the Parliament commends the work of Boroughmuir High School pupils who have shown their initiative, skill and innovation by creating a successful and ethical educational enterprise, Pursuit UK, which allows pupils to trade exam revision materials at below high street value; congratulates the team on receiving almost 20,000 website hits in a matter of months and also on winning the regional final of the Young Enterprise competition; wishes the team good luck in the Scottish final and any further stages of the competition to which it progresses, and, finally, commends the pupils for proving that Scotland has a bright, talented business future.

S3M-4226 Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success (lodged on 26 May 2009) Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Cathy Jamieson*, Sarah Boyack*, Stuart McMillan*, Karen Whitefield*, John Park*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Jamie McGrigor*, Pauline McNeill*, Mike Pringle*, Jackie Baillie*
S3M-4226 Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success (lodged on 26 May 2009) Bill Kidd*, Christine Grahame*, Ted Brocklebank*, Robin Harper*

S3M-4226 George Foulkes: Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success—That the Parliament commends the work of Boroughmuir High School pupils who have shown their initiative, skill and innovation by creating a successful and ethical educational enterprise, Pursuit UK, which allows pupils to trade exam revision materials at below high street value; congratulates the team on receiving almost 20,000 website hits in a matter of months and also on winning the regional final of the Young Enterprise competition; wishes the team good luck in the Scottish final and any further stages of the competition to which it progresses, and, finally, commends the pupils for proving that Scotland has a bright, talented business future. Supported by: Shirley-Anne Somerville, Cathy Jamieson, Sarah Boyack, Stuart McMillan, Karen Whitefield, John Park, Mary Mulligan, Mr Frank McAveety, Jamie McGrigor, Pauline McNeill, Mike Pringle, Jackie Baillie, Bill Kidd, Christine Grahame, Ted Brocklebank, Robin Harper
S3M-4226 Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success (lodged on 26 May 2009) Jack McConnell*
S3M-4226 Good Luck to Boroughmuir Pupils in their Pursuit of Success (lodged on 26 May 2009) Marilyn Livingstone*
